page.title: 13Historical Interests
page.content: ....1546. The Kirkclady family occupied Hallyard until 1616, when, the Palace and Lands were passed to the Boswells',who sold it to William Forbes of Craigievar. In 1627 the estate was again passed over - tothe Skeene family. The Skeene family kept the estate until 1715 when because the estate was so heavily encumbered, it was resigned to the Earl of Moray. The Palace was allowed to become a ruin - stones were taken to repair the parish Church - until there are now only a few stones to mark its site.
